name: Click-Mine-Sell
description:
A simple 2h hour long clicker and goods management game, where you mine ores and sell them raw or later smelt them to bars for higher profit. Upgrade the headquarters to unlock more and more different goods and production lines. Sell at the highest tiers and when the price is right to achieve the goal of becoming a billionaire!

Controls:

-Drag the corner of the window to change window size

-WASD or Arrow-Keys to move the camera, or drag the camera with the left or right mouse button

-Use Mouse scroll wheel to zoom camera in and out

-Press Shift to purchase or sell automations in bulks of 10

-Press Ctrl to purchase or sell automations in bulks of 100

-Press 1,2,3,4 to change modes and their help description
